DocAttribute.Name: TangentialContinuity
DocAttribute.Documentation: Connectivity between the continuous segments is not enforced per se to be tangential. Setting "TangentialContinuity" to True means that the current segment shall continue with tangential continuity to the previous one.

DocAttribute.Name: StartTag
DocAttribute.Documentation: Tag to annotate the start point of the alignment segment.

DocAttribute.Name: EndTag
DocAttribute.Documentation: Tag to annotate the end point of the alignment segment.
